title: Circle of the Land
content: isdom Range: 18m/60ft Create Water Lv 1 Transmutation Action Call forth rain. It extinguishes exposed flames and forms a water surface. Range: 9m/30ft Cure Wounds Lv 1 Evocation Action 1d8+[Spellcasting Modifier] hit pointsA creature you touch regains 1d8+[Spellcasting Modifier] hit points.This spell has no effect on undead or constructs. Range: 1.5m/5ft Entangle Lv 1 Conjuration Action Vines sprout from the ground, turning it into difficult terrain and possibly Entangling creatures within. Atta
